agent

Class FeedbackManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • agent.Agent
      • agent.FeedbackManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    reactor.fn.Consumer<reactor.bus.Event<ParserMessageJSON>>

    @Component
public class FeedbackManager
extends Agent
    Generate user weight line chart and nutrient pie chart. State map: 0 - Ask feedback duration 1 - Ask chart type 2 - Send chart to user
